alert.note: Alert for Vale BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 02 at 7:09AM PDT until September 03 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST OREGON AND SOUTHWEST IDAHO SATURDAY... .Winds are now not expected to reach Red Flag Warning Criteria for the Burns BLM today, therefore the Watch is cancelled. The Fire Weather Watch for Saturday will be reevaluated this afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 637... * WINDS...15-25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...7-12 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
